description: [Aquatic Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0143) used a registry edit to enable a Windows feature called RestrictedAdmin in victim environments. This change allowed [Aquatic Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0143) to leverage "pass the hash" mechanisms as the alteration allows for RDP connections with a valid account name and hash only, without possessing a cleartext password value.(Citation: Crowdstrike HuntReport 2022)

external_references.description: CrowdStrike. (2023). 2022 Falcon OverWatch Threat Hunting Report. Retrieved May 20, 2024.
